```
"C:\Users\Alfy\Lavoro\bristol\transp-text-new\node_modules\.bin\fluid" non ï¿½ riconosciuto come comando interno o esterno,
```

This is not part of the actual text that you want annotated. If we assume this is an error and should be removed, the revised paragraph would look like:

**Revised Paragraph:**

Table 1 gives an overview of the historical datasets, covering languages from different language families—as well as different text genres and time periods.

Since there are no explicit values, comparative expressions, or superlative/aggregated expressions in the revised paragraph, no Fluid annotations are needed. If you intended to include some comparisons or specific numbers, please provide the corrected paragraph.
